title: HOUR 1 - NFL draft, Steelers, Ravens, Paul
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - NFL draft, Steelers, Ravens, Paul
description:
Thoughts on the first round of the NFL draft

Colin discusses the Steelers drafting Kenny Pickett

The Ravens did the right thing

Chris Paul keeps reminding us how great he is


Guest: Albert Breer

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
